professional_summary: Experienced Database Administrator with expertise in MS SQL Server, database design, performance tuning, and disaster recovery. Proficient in ETL tools, reporting services, and cloud platforms like Microsoft Azure and AWS.

key_responsibilities: Designed backup and recovery strategies for SQL Server databases to meet SLA requirements.
Managed and maintained production Microsoft SQL Server 2008R2 environments.
Recommended and implemented best practices for SQL architecture.
Conducted database optimization and resource allocation for optimum performance.
